questions.question: Ethereum transitioned from Proof of Work to Proof of ______ during the Merge.
The smallest unit of ETH is called ______.
Ethereum's virtual machine, known as the Ethereum Virtual ______, processes smart contracts.
Gas fees are paid in the cryptocurrency ______.
Validators are required to stake at least ______ ETH to participate in Ethereum’s Proof of Stake.
The cypherpunk movement aims to achieve ______ through cryptography.
Zero-knowledge proof systems like zk-______ are used to enhance transaction privacy in Ethereum.
A protocol enabling private Ethereum transactions is called Tornado ______.
The use of ______ prevents replay attacks on Ethereum transactions.
Cypherpunks advocate for the use of ______ systems to resist censorship and surveillance.
Ethereum’s human-readable address system is called Ethereum Name ______.
Social ______ wallets allow users to recover their accounts without remembering their seed phrase.
A user-friendly interface for interacting with Ethereum dApps is provided by the ______ wallet.
High ______ fees are a common usability challenge in Ethereum.
An Ethereum wallet stores private keys and allows users to sign ______.
The EIP-1559 mechanism burns a portion of transaction fees to make ETH potentially ______.
In Proof of Stake, validators risk losing funds through ______ for dishonest behavior.
Ethereum uses Gas ______ to prevent spam transactions on the network.
Block ______ is the total reward earned by validators for adding a block to the Ethereum blockchain.
MEV stands for Miner/______ Extractable Value.
